Metadata.Title: CVE-2026-25506 affecting package munge for versions less than 0.5.18-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2026-25506 affecting package munge for versions less than 0.5.18-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package munge is earlier than 0.5.18-1, affected by CVE-2026-25506
